
[Amazon Dashboard](https://globalfiredata.org/pages/amazon-dashboard/)
Tracks individual fires, and categorizes them (Savanna - small clear & agriculture - understory - deforestation)
free

[Global Forest Watch](https://www.globalforestwatch.org/topics/fires/)
Helps detect changes in forest cover (i.e., to track deforestation). Also includes Global Fire Watch (VIRSS data)
free
More environmental maps are in this tab
location pins

[Globel Forest Watch Fires](https://www.globalforestwatch.org/map/?%3D&menu=eyJtZW51U2VjdGlvbiI6Im15LWdmdyIsImRhdGFzZXRDYXRlZ29yeSI6IiJ9)
Fires on a global map - free

[Global Forest Watch (Biodiversity)](https://www.globalforestwatch.org/map/?mainMap=eyJzaG93QW5hbHlzaXMiOnRydWV9&%3D%3D&mapMenu=eyJtZW51U2VjdGlvbiI6ImRhdGFzZXRzIiwiZGF0YXNldENhdGVnb3J5IjoiYmlvZGl2ZXJzaXR5In0%3D&mapPrompts=eyJvcGVuIjp0cnVlLCJzdGVwc0tleSI6InN1YnNjcmliZVRvQXJlYSIsInN0ZXBzSW5kZXgiOjAsImZvcmNlIjp0cnVlfQ%3D%3D)
Global Forest Watch also includes maps with biodiversity hotspots, including birds and tigers - free

[Satellite Detected Gas Flaring](https://viirs.skytruth.org/apps/heatmap/flaringmap.html#lat=52.33314&lon=6.46027&zoom=7&offset=27)
free

[Unitar](http://www.unitar.org/)
Unitar Disaster & Damage Assessment
Unitar satellite imagery & maps of floodings, fires, conflict & internally displaced persons - free

Explosive Detonation Velocities
A wikipedia list of detonation velocities of various materials. - free
[See this tweet by Quantian1 on the Beirut explosion, video footage, and assessing which material might have caused the explosion.](https://twitter.com/quantian1/status/1290695231910875136)

[ArcGIS Wildfire Map](https://www.arcgis.com/home/webmap/viewer.html?webmap=df8bcc10430f48878b01c96e907a1fc3#!)

[GitHub - DRMALEK/Wildfire_Research_Resources: A repository to be used as a resource in the wildfire area like the detection, forecasting, and segmentation of wildfires, after the heart-breaking wildfires in Turkey](https://github.com/DRMALEK/Wildfire_Research_Resources)

[MODIS Wildfire](https://www.arcgis.com/apps/dashboards/bf5df3a49a624521844a2e5e1ec7df05)

[FIRMS](https://firms.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov/map/)
Real Time Fires Map
